item.title: Readings
item.description: Required readings come directly from the course lecture notes. Additional reading can be found inÂ the following text: Russell, Stuart J., and Peter Norvig. Artificial intelligence: a modern approach. 2nd edition. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall, 2003. ISBN: 0137903952. (AIMA2E). See the table for assigned and supplemental readings. SES # TOPICS READINGS L1 Introduction Assigned Readings: Lecture Notes - Chapter 1. Supplemental Readings: AIMA2E: Chapter 1. R1 Scheme Review and Matching
